name: Crypto Crashers
description:
Submission for Wowie Jam 4.0.
Theme: Collaborate with AI.

Controls: 
Left/Right arrow keys  or A/D to steer.
Left mouse button to interact.
Play this bad boy full screen because, uh, I'm not great at UI stuff.

Whelp, team Laser Jock got COVID right before this jam kicked off. Wowie, indeed. This game is the spaghetti coded product of 'rona brain and a weekend hopped up on cold medicine.  We hope you enjoy it, it sure was fun to make. Don't try this IRL kids (looking at you Jay). 

Post your hi-score below. Let's send Laser Coin to the moooon!

Art by SAS

Music

https://opengameart.org/content/calm-relax-1-synthwave-421k
